summary:
Oklahoma City is the capital and biggest city in Oklahoma, USA. It has over 680,000 people and is growing. The city is known for its large livestock market and oil industry. It's located in the middle of an oil field! Oklahoma City is also an important transport hub, connecting many states.

The city has a sad history, including a terrorist bombing in 1995, the worst in US history at that time. It has also experienced many powerful tornadoes. Despite these challenges, Oklahoma City is a significant place in the Southern United States.
title: Oklahoma City
